de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm

Class AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,R extends Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - the type of objects handled by this Algorithm
    R - the type of result to retrieve from this Algorithm
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDBOutlier, AbstractHDBSCAN, AbstractOPTICS, AGNES, AnderbergHierarchicalClustering, AveragePrecisionAtK, CanopyPreClustering, CBLOF, COF, COP, CTLuGLSBackwardSearchAlgorithm, CTLuRandomWalkEC, DBSCAN, DeLiClu, DistanceQuantileSampler, DistanceStatisticsWithClasses, DWOF, EstimateIntrinsicDimensionality, EvaluateRankingQuality, EvaluateRetrievalPerformance, GriDBSCAN, HilOut, IDOS, INFLO, IntrinsicDimensionalityOutlier, KDEOS, KMedoidsEM, KMedoidsPAM, KNNBenchmarkAlgorithm, KNNClassifier, KNNDistancesSampler, KNNJoin, KNNOutlier, KNNWeightOutlier, LDF, LDOF, LocalIsolationCoefficient, LOCI, LOF, LSDBC, MaterializeDistances, NaiveMeanShiftClustering, ODIN, OPTICSOF, ParallelKNNOutlier, ParallelKNNWeightOutlier, ParallelLOF, ParallelSimplifiedLOF, RangeQueryBenchmarkAlgorithm, RangeQuerySelectivity, RankingQualityHistogram, SilhouetteOutlierDetection, SimpleCOP, SimpleKernelDensityLOF, SimplifiedLOF, SLINK, ValidateApproximativeKNNIndex, VarianceOfVolume

    public abstract class AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,R extends Result>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<R>
implements DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O>
    Abstract base class for distance-based algorithms.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Arthur Zimek
